org.petuum.jbosen.row.long_

Class DenseLongColumnMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.petuum.jbosen.row.long_.LongColumnMap
      • org.petuum.jbosen.row.long_.DenseLongColumnMap
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DenseLongRow, DenseLongRowUpdate

    public class DenseLongColumnMap
extends LongColumnMap
    This implementation of LongColumnMap assumes that column IDs are dense, ie. they are contiguous values from 0 to capacity - 1. In general, this class is more CPU and memory efficient than SparseLongColumnMap.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int columnId)
        Check if this map contains the specified column. This map will always contain column IDs that are from 0 to capacity - 1, and will always not contain any other column IDs.
        Specified by:
        contains in class LongColumnMap
        Parameters:
        columnId - the column ID to check.
        Returns:
        whether the map contains the given column ID.

      • get

        public long get(int columnId)
        Returns the value associated with a particular column ID. Will throw a run-time exception if columnId is out-of-bounds.
        Specified by:
        get in class LongColumnMap
        Parameters:
        columnId - the column ID.
        Returns:
        the value associated with columnId.
